name: Hardware Tools
featureOne: It’s a tools manufacturer website. Authenticate user order tools maintain minimum quantity.
featureTwo: Normal users can buy tools, and see orders and their profiles. Also can pay for orders by stripe.
featureThree: Admin can add tools, change shipment status, cancel orders and manage orders, and make a normal user to admin. That means a different dashboard for normal users and admins.
featureFour: There are another page is dashboard, It is special because in this dashboard page I implement nested routing. Thats means normal user see some route or page and admin see another type of route or page.
featureFive: In home page have navbar and footer, it is not only home page but also all page have this two pages. And also have banner, services that wer are provided, tools or product, customer review and business summary.
technology: react, react-router-dom, tailwind CSS, firebase, react-firebase-hooks, react-toastify, daisyui (component library), react-query, react-hook form, json web token, stripe (payment system), etc.

name: Bicycle Spot
featureOne: Basically it’s a warehouse management website. Users can do some activities for stocks.
featureTwo: Verify users can restock quantity, deliver stock, manage stock, add stock and also delete stock.
featureThree: This website has six pages with authentication and functionality like users can add an item by filling up a stock details form, and also can see stock items (user order items) by login user.
featureFour: In this website I'am showing bicycle stock. Also called it warehouse and management system not like ecommarch website. In this website have a home page and this home page have six section. In the top have header or nav bar and the bottom have footer. This tow section show every page.
featureFive: In inventory Items have some stock each stock stay card. In this card have a stock update button. If you click this button you will go detail page. And you can delivery stock and update stock.
technology: axios, bootstrap, firebase, react, react-bootstrap, react-dom, react-firebase-hooks, react-toastify, etc.

name: Capture Nature
featureOne: Actually It’s a front-end base website. In home page has a beautiful and unique design like the best capture section (i’ts image is dynamic).
featureTwo: Authenticated users can buy services by clicking the buy button with filling up a simple form.
featureThree: Apply authentication systems like Google, Facebook, and Github. After login you can give us shipping info for delivery.
featureFour: In Home page contain header, footer (header and footer not only have home page but also have all pages in this website), banner, services, some showup photo.
featureFive: Services page contain product or image thats i'm buying. If you click Buy button than you are going to first time login page. If your are not register, at first you need to register then login.
technology: react, react-router-dom, bootstrap, firebase, react-firebase-hooks, react-toastify, etc.
